code: Inductive dim:Set := zero : dim | one : dim.
Lemma eq_dim_dec : forall i k : dim, {i=k}+{~i=k}.
Definition dim_opp(k:dim):dim:= match k with zero => one | one => zero end.
Definition eq_point(p q :point):= fst p = fst q /\ snd p = snd q.
Lemma Req_dec_1 : forall r1 r2 : R, {r1 = r2} + {r1 <> r2}.
intros; generalize (total_order_T r1 r2) Rlt_dichotomy_converse; intuition eauto 3.
Lemma eq_point_dec : forall (p q:point), {eq_point p q} + {~eq_point p q}.
Inductive fmap:Set := V : fmap | I : fmap->dart->tag->point->fmap | L : fmap->dim->dart->dart->fmap.
Definition empty(m:fmap): Prop:= match m with V => True | _ => False end.
Fixpoint exd(m:fmap)(x:dart){struct m} : Prop:= match m with V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end.
Lemma exd_dec: forall (m:fmap)(x:dart), {exd m x}+{~exd m x}.
Fixpoint ftag(m:fmap)(x:dart){struct m}:tag:= match m with V => 0%nat | I m0 x0 t0 _ => if eq_dart_dec x0 x then t0 else ftag m0 x | L m0 k x0 y0 => ftag m0 x end.
Fixpoint fpoint(m:fmap)(x:dart){struct m}:point:= match m with V => (0%R, 0%R) | I m0 x0 _ p0 => if eq_dart_dec x0 x then p0 else fpoint m0 x | L m0 k x0 y0 => fpoint m0 x end.

Fixpoint A (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart) {struct m}:dart:= match m with V => nil | I m0 x0 _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end.
Definition succ(m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart):= A m k x <> nil.
Lemma succ_dec: forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), {succ m k x} + {~succ m k x}.

Fixpoint A_1 (m:fmap)(k:dim)(y:dart) {struct m}:dart:= match m with V => nil | I m0 x0 _ _ => A_1 m0 k y | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if (eq_dim_dec k0 k) then if (eq_dart_dec y0 y) then x0 else A_1 m0 k y else A_1 m0 k y end.
Definition pred(m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart):= A_1 m k x <> nil.
Lemma pred_dec: forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), {pred m k x} + {~pred m k x}.
Fixpoint D(m:fmap)(x:dart){struct m}:fmap:= match m with V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else (I (D m0 x) x0 t0 p0) | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => L (D m0 x) k0 x0 y0 end.

Fixpoint B(m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart){struct m}:fmap:= match m with V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => (I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0) | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if (eq_dim_dec k0 k) then if (eq_dart_dec x0 x) then m0 else (L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0) else (L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0) end.

Fixpoint B_1(m:fmap)(k:dim)(y:dart){struct m}:fmap:= match m with V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 =>(I (B_1 m0 k y) x0 t0 p0) | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if (eq_dim_dec k0 k) then if (eq_dart_dec y0 y) then m0 else (L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0) else (L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0) end.

Fixpoint cA(m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart){struct m}:dart:= match m with V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if (eq_dim_dec k0 k) then if (eq_dart_dec x z) then y else if (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z) then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1(m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart){struct m}:dart:= match m with V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if (eq_dim_dec k0 k) then if (eq_dart_dec y z) then x else if (eq_dart_dec (cA m0 k x) z) then cA_1 m0 k y else cA_1 m0 k z else cA_1 m0 k z end.
Definition prec_I (m:fmap)(x:dart):= x <> nil /\ ~exd m x .
Definition prec_L (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x y:dart) := exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~succ m k x /\ ~pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y.
Fixpoint inv_hmap(m:fmap):Prop:= match m with V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end.
Definition hmap_to_fmap(q:hmap):fmap:= match q with exist m _=> m end.
Lemma not_exd_nil : forall m:fmap, inv_hmap m -> ~exd m nil.
Lemma exd_not_nil : forall (m:fmap)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil.
Lemma succ_exd : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z.
Lemma pred_exd : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m z.
Lemma not_exd_A_nil: forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~exd m z -> A m k z = nil.
Lemma not_exd_A_1_nil: forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~exd m z -> A_1 m k z = nil.
Lemma A_nil: forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> A m k nil = nil.
Lemma A_1_nil: forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> A_1 m k nil = nil.
Lemma succ_exd_A : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z).
Lemma pred_exd_A_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m (A_1 m k z).
Lemma exd_A_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A m k z) -> exd m z.
unfold succ in |- *; unfold pred in |- *.
Lemma exd_A_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A_1 m k z) -> exd m z.
unfold succ in |- *; unfold pred in |- *.
Lemma A_1_A : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z.
Lemma A_A_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> A m k (A_1 m k z) = z.
Definition inj_dart(Df:dart->Prop)(f:dart->dart):Prop:= forall x x':dart, (Df x)->(Df x')->(f x)=(f x')->x=x'.
Lemma inj_A: forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (succ m k) (A m k).
intros x x' Hx Hx' Heg.
assert (x = A_1 m k (A m k x)).
assert (x' = A_1 m k (A m k x')).
Lemma inj_A_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (pred m k) (A_1 m k).
intros x x' Hx Hx' Heg.
assert (x = A m k (A_1 m k x)).
assert (x' = A m k (A_1 m k x')).
Lemma succ_pred_clos : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (cA m k z <> nil /\ cA_1 m k z <> nil).
Lemma exd_cA_cA_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (cA m k z) /\ exd m (cA_1 m k z).
Lemma cA_exd : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z <> nil -> exd m z.
Lemma cA_1_exd : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z <> nil -> exd m z.
Lemma not_exd_cA : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~exd m z -> cA m k z = nil.
Lemma not_exd_cA_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = nil.
Lemma exd_cA_exd : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA m k z) -> exd m z.
Lemma exd_cA_1_exd : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA_1 m k z) -> exd m z.
Lemma exd_cA:forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> (exd m z <-> exd m (cA m k z)).
Lemma exd_cA_1:forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> (exd m z <-> exd m (cA_1 m k z)).
Lemma cA_1_cA : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z.
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA m k d0) (cA m k d0)).
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA m k d0) (cA m k z)).
Lemma cA_cA_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z.
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m k d1) (cA_1 m k d1)).
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m k d1) (cA_1 m k z)).
Lemma inj_cA: forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (exd m) (cA m k).
intros x x' Hx Hx' Heg.
assert (x = cA_1 m k (cA m k x)).
Lemma inj_cA_1: forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (exd m) (cA_1 m k).
intros x x' Hx Hx' Heg.
assert (x = cA m k (cA_1 m k x)).
Lemma fixpt_cA_cA_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~succ m k z -> ~pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z.
unfold succ in |- *; unfold pred in |- *.
unfold succ in |- *; unfold pred in |- *.
unfold pred in |- *; unfold succ in |- *.
unfold pred in |- *; unfold succ in |- *.
Lemma A_cA : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x y:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y.
generalize (not_exd_A_nil m k x H3 H5).
Lemma A_1_cA_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x y:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y.
Definition surj_dart(Df:dart->Prop)(f:dart->dart):Prop := forall y:dart, Df y -> exists x : dart, Df x /\ f x = y.
Lemma surj_cA : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> surj_dart (exd m) (cA m k).
Lemma surj_cA_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> surj_dart (exd m) (cA_1 m k).
Definition bij_dart(Df:dart->Prop)(f:dart->dart):Prop:= inj_dart Df f /\ surj_dart Df f.
Theorem bij_cA : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (cA m k).
Theorem bij_cA_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (cA_1 m k).
Lemma not_exd_D : forall (m:fmap)(x:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~exd (D m x) x.
Lemma exd_D : forall (m:fmap)(x z:dart), inv_hmap m -> x <> z -> (exd m z <-> exd (D m x) z).
Lemma exd_B : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x z:dart), exd m z <-> exd (B m k x) z.
Lemma exd_B_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x z:dart), exd m z <-> exd (B_1 m k x) z.
Lemma not_succ_B:forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~succ m k z -> B m k z = m.
Lemma not_pred_B_1:forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~pred m k z -> B_1 m k z = m.
Lemma A_B : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), inv_hmap m -> A (B m k x) k x = nil.
Lemma A_B_bis : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x y:dart), y<>x -> A (B m k x) k y = A m k y.
Lemma A_B_ter : forall (m:fmap)(k j:dim)(x y:dart), k<>j -> A (B m k x) j y = A m j y.
rewrite <-a0 in H; rewrite <-a2 in H.
rewrite <-a in H; rewrite <-a0 in H; tauto.
Lemma B_not_exd : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~exd m x -> B m k x = m.
Lemma B_nil : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> B m k nil = m.
Lemma B_1_not_exd : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~exd m x -> B_1 m k x = m.
Lemma B_1_nil : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> B_1 m k nil = m.
Lemma A_1_B : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), inv_hmap m -> A_1 (B m k x) k (A m k x) = nil.
Lemma A_1_B_bis : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x y:dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A m k x -> A_1 (B m k x) k y = A_1 m k y.
Lemma A_1_B_ter : forall (m:fmap)(k j:dim)(x y:dart), k<>j -> A_1 (B m k x) j y = A_1 m j y.
rewrite <- a0 in H; rewrite <- a2 in H.
Lemma A_1_B_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), inv_hmap m -> A_1 (B_1 m k x) k x = nil.
Lemma A_1_B_1_bis : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x y:dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> x -> A_1 (B_1 m k x) k y = A_1 m k y.
Lemma A_1_B_1_ter : forall (m:fmap)(k j:dim)(x y:dart), k<>j -> A_1 (B_1 m k x) j y = A_1 m j y.
rewrite <- a0 in H; rewrite <- a2 in H.
rewrite <- a in H; rewrite <- a0 in H; tauto.
Lemma A_B_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), inv_hmap m -> A (B_1 m k x) k (A_1 m k x) = nil.
Lemma A_B_1_bis : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x y:dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A_1 m k x -> A (B_1 m k x) k y = A m k y.
Lemma A_B_1_ter : forall (m:fmap)(k j:dim)(x y:dart), k<>j -> A (B_1 m k x) j y = A m j y.
rewrite <- a0 in H; rewrite <- a2 in H.

Fixpoint top (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart){struct m}:dart:= match m with V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end.

Fixpoint bottom (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart){struct m}:dart:= match m with V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if (eq_dim_dec k0 k) then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end.
Lemma top_nil : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> top m k nil = nil.
Lemma bottom_nil : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim), inv_hmap m -> bottom m k nil = nil.
Lemma not_exd_top : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~exd m z -> top m k z = nil.
Lemma not_exd_bottom : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~exd m z -> bottom m k z = nil.
Lemma exd_top:forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z).
Lemma exd_bottom:forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z).
Lemma nosucc_top : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~succ m k z -> top m k z = z.
Lemma nopred_bottom : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z.
Lemma top_bottom_bis:forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z.
elim (eq_dart_dec d0 (top m d (bottom m d d0))).
elim (eq_dart_dec d0 (top m d (bottom m d z))).
Lemma bottom_top_bis:forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z.
elim (eq_dart_dec d1 (bottom m d (top m d d1))).
elim (eq_dart_dec d1 (bottom m d (top m d z))).
Lemma cA_bottom : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z.
Lemma cA_1_top : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~pred m k z -> cA_1 m k z = top m k z.
Lemma cA_eq_aux : forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z = if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z.
generalize (A_cA m k z (A m k z) H H0).
Lemma cA_eq : forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z = if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z.
generalize (A_cA m k z (A m k z) H H0).
Lemma cA_1_eq_aux : forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z.
generalize (A_1_cA_1 m k z (A_1 m k z) H H0).
Lemma cA_1_eq : forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z = if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z.
generalize (A_1_cA_1 m k z (A_1 m k z) H H0).
Lemma top_bottom : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z.
elim (eq_dart_dec d0 (top m d (bottom m d d0))).
elim (eq_dart_dec d0 (top m d (bottom m d z))).
Lemma bottom_top : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z.
elim (eq_dart_dec d1 (bottom m d (top m d d1))).
elim (eq_dart_dec d1 (bottom m d (top m d z))).
Lemma top_A : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (A m k z) = top m k z.
elim (eq_dart_dec d0 (top m d (A m k z))).
Lemma bottom_A : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> bottom m k (A m k z) = bottom m k z.
elim (eq_dart_dec d1 (bottom m d (A m k z))).
Lemma bottom_A_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> bottom m k (A_1 m k z) = bottom m k z.
elim (eq_dart_dec d1 (bottom m d (A_1 m k z))).
Lemma top_A_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> top m k (A_1 m k z) = top m k z.
elim (eq_dart_dec d0 (top m d (A_1 m k z))).
Lemma not_succ_top : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~succ m k (top m k z).
Lemma not_pred_bottom : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~pred m k (bottom m k z).
Lemma top_top_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z.
Lemma top_top_2 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z.
elim (eq_dart_dec d0 (top m k (top m k d1))).
elim (eq_dart_dec d0 (top m k (top m k z))).
elim (eq_dart_dec d0 (top m k (top m k d1))).
elim (eq_dart_dec d0 (top m k (top m k z))).
Lemma top_top : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z.
Lemma bottom_bottom_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (bottom m k z) = bottom m k z.
Lemma bottom_bottom_2 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> bottom m k (bottom m k z) = bottom m k z.
elim (eq_dart_dec d1 (bottom m k (bottom m k d0))).
elim (eq_dart_dec d1 (bottom m k (bottom m k z))).
elim (eq_dart_dec d1 (bottom m k (bottom m k d0))).
elim (eq_dart_dec d1 (bottom m k (bottom m k z))).
Lemma bottom_bottom : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> bottom m k (bottom m k z) = bottom m k z.
Lemma succ_bottom:forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> bottom m k x <> A m k x.
Lemma pred_top :forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k x -> top m k x <> A_1 m k x.
Lemma cA_top:forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z.
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m k d1) (top m d d1)).
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m k d1) (top m d z)).
assert (d1 = cA m d (top m d z)).
assert (cA_1 m k d1 = top m d z).
Lemma cA_1_bottom:forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z.
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA m k d0) (bottom m d d0)).
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA m k d0) (bottom m d z)).
assert (d0 = cA_1 m d (bottom m d z)).
assert (cA m k d0 = bottom m d z).
Lemma top_top_bottom:forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(x y:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y.
assert (bottom m k (top m k x) = bottom m k (top m k y)).
rewrite (nopred_bottom m k y) in H4.
Lemma bottom_bottom_top:forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(x y:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y.
assert (top m k (bottom m k x) = top m k (bottom m k y)).
rewrite (nosucc_top m k y) in H4.
Lemma top_top_bottom_bottom:forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(x y:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y.
assert (~ pred m k (bottom m k y)).
assert (top m k x = top m k (bottom m k y)).
apply (top_top_bottom m k x (bottom m k y) H H0 H3 H4 H5).
Lemma bottom_bottom_top_top:forall(m:fmap)(k:dim)(x y:dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = top m k y.
assert (~ succ m k (top m k y)).
assert (bottom m k x = bottom m k (top m k y)).
apply (bottom_bottom_top m k x (top m k y) H H0 H3 H4 H5).

Lemma cA_cA_1_B : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x z:dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z) /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z).
fold (succ m i x) in H0.
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 (B m i x) i d1) z).

absurd (pred m i (bottom m i d0)).
absurd (pred m i (bottom m i d0)).

Lemma cA_B : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x z:dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z).
generalize (cA_cA_1_B m k x z H H0).

Lemma cA_1_B : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x z:dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z).
generalize (cA_cA_1_B m k x z H H0).
Lemma cA_cA_1_B_bis : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z.
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 (B m k x) k d1) z).
generalize (IHm k x d0 H1 H0).
decompose [and] (IHm k x d1 H1 H0).
decompose [and] (IHm k x d1 H1 H0).
decompose [and] (IHm k x z H1 H0).
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA (B m k x) k d0) z).
decompose [and] (IHm k x d1 H1 H0).
decompose [and] (IHm k x d0 H1 H0).
decompose [and] (IHm k x d0 H1 H0).
decompose [and] (IHm k x z H1 H0).
Lemma cA_B_bis : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z.
generalize (cA_cA_1_B_bis m k x z H H0).
Lemma cA_1_B_bis : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x z:dart), inv_hmap m -> ~succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z.
generalize (cA_cA_1_B_bis m k x z H H0).
Lemma cA_cA_1_B_ter : forall (m:fmap)(k j:dim)(x z:dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) j z = cA_1 m j z.
decompose [and] (IHm k j x d0 H1 H).
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 (B m k x) j d1) z).
decompose [and] (IHm k j x d0 H1).
decompose [and] (IHm k j x d1 H1 H).
decompose [and] (IHm k j x d1 H1 H).
decompose [and] (IHm k j x z H1 H).
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 (B m k x) j d1) z).
decompose [and] (IHm k j x d1 H1 H).
decompose [and] (IHm k j x d1 H1 H).
decompose [and] (IHm k j x z H1 H).
elim (eq_dart_dec (cA (B m k x) j d0) z).
decompose [and] (IHm k j x d1 H1 H).
decompose [and] (IHm k j x d1 H1 H).
decompose [and] (IHm k j x z H1 H).
Lemma cA_B_ter : forall (m:fmap)(k j:dim)(x z:dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z.
generalize (cA_cA_1_B_ter m k j x z).
Lemma cA_1_B_ter : forall (m:fmap)(k j:dim)(x z:dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA_1 (B m k x) j z = cA_1 m j z.
generalize (cA_cA_1_B_ter m k j x z).
Lemma inv_hmap_B : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(z:dart), inv_hmap m -> inv_hmap (B m k z).
Lemma B_1_eq : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), inv_hmap m -> B_1 m k x = B m k (A_1 m k x).
Lemma inv_hmap_B_1 : forall (m:fmap)(k:dim)(x:dart), inv_hmap m -> inv_hmap (B_1 m k x).
